title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS libraries to pull and run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, etc. locally with GPU acceleration and OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, create and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama’s local models for chains, agents, retrieval, tool-calling, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now “Open WebUI”); supports multi-user, RAG, plugins, and Docker deployment.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async, streaming, and model management APIs.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI with interactive chat sessions, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers threads using local Ollama models; supports streaming and code blocks.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node to integrate local Ollama models into no-code workflows (chat, generate, embed).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with strongly-typed requests/responses and async streaming.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration that injects an Ollama4j client bean and adds actuator endpoints.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate (separate from pepperoni21’s) focusing on async streams and model creation APIs.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda external-task workers that use Ollama models for human-task classification and summarization.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for pipelines.
